'Untitled' is a public sculpture by American artist Cary Chapman on the campus
of Indiana University-Purdue University Indianapolis, which is near downtown
Indianapolis, Indiana. It sits below the back steps of the IUPUI University
Library and the Business/SPEA building in Wood Plaza, closest to the corner of
New York Street and Blackford Street.

It is a steel sculpture that measures 16 feet high, 4 feet 8 inches long,
and 3 feet in width.
categories: Indiana University – Purdue University Indianapolis Public Art Collection
